accueil_title: Welcome to the Portfolio of Foulail Oumar
profil_p1: My name is Foulail Oumar. I am 22 years old and passionate about IT.
profil_p2: I first studied STMG at Lyc√©e Jacques Brel.
profil_p3: Then I completed a BTS SIO (SLAM).

profil_exp_p1: I completed several internships in public and private organizations.
profil_exp_p2: These experiences helped me improve my technical and professional skills.
profil_q_p: I am rigorous, motivated, curious and passionate about learning.
bts_intro_text: BTS SIO is an IT program with two paths: SLAM (development) and SISR (networks).
bts_voillaume_text: A complete program with strong academic supervision.
bts_sio_text: Skills in development, networking, cybersecurity and information systems.
oclock_p1: I joined O'Clock in 2025 to follow the Web & Mobile Developer program.
oclock_project_p: Full-stack application with CRUD, API and React frontend.
